title: How to Make Potato Pancakes

steps.headline: Prepare the potatoes.
steps.description: Peel the potatoes and then shred or grate them. Put them into a bowl.

steps.headline: Break the egg into the bowl with the shredded potato.
steps.description: Add the flour into the bowl.

steps.headline: Add a pinch of salt and stir using a spoon tp mix everything together.
Pour about a tablespoonful of cooking oil onto a frying pan, turn up the heat to medium, and wait for the cooking oil to heat up.
Scoop one spoonful of the batter into the frying pan to make a pancake.
steps.description: Keep adding spoons of batter to make as many pancakes as your skillet will hold.

steps.headline: Have the pancakes cook.
steps.description: Wait until the pancakes are golden brown and then flip the pancakes. Ensure the potato is cooked. When the cakes are golden brown on both sides they are ready to be eaten.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Serve the pancakes on a plate using a spatula. Try them with scrambled eggs, bacon or mushrooms and tomatoes.

text: Prepare the potatoes. Peel the potatoes and then shred or grate them. Put them into a bowl. Break the egg into the bowl with the shredded potato. Add the flour into the bowl. Add a pinch of salt and stir using a spoon tp mix everything together.  Pour about a tablespoonful of cooking oil onto a frying pan, turn up the heat to medium, and wait for the cooking oil to heat up.  Scoop one spoonful of the batter into the frying pan to make a pancake. Keep adding spoons of batter to make as many pancakes as your skillet will hold. Have the pancakes cook. Wait until the pancakes are golden brown and then flip the pancakes. Ensure the potato is cooked. When the cakes are golden brown on both sides they are ready to be eaten. Serve. Serve the pancakes on a plate using a spatula. Try them with scrambled eggs, bacon or mushrooms and tomatoes. Finished.
